channel.title: 3d :)
channel.description: i was thinking playin mopar wit my friend he use 2 own lawscape he quit on it and say it was 2 easy well me and him are think a game jus like rs but in 3D!!! and i said lets c wut the ppl think first so if u think its cool then say yes :D so plz say wut u think

item.title: 3d :)
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

I guess if you really wanted to put the time into it, someone with a directx capable graphics card and a good understanding of C++ wouldn’t have to much of a problem doing it. Honestly, I think that if someone created a fps type graphic version of one of the more recent deobs of RuneScape, I would play it. I’m pretty sure a lot of the anti runescape people think that runescape is bad, because they’re graphics are. To them I have to say…

HARRY POTTER

graphics is NOT everything.

Read full topic

item.title: 3d :)
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Making a 3D java game isn’t that hard. I did it. Andrew Gower did it. Oh, wait. The original Runescape was only 2.5 dimensional (3D world+sprites) and Runescape3D was developed by a whole bunch of people. And the game I made sucked. So yeah. It’s hard.

Read full topic

item.title: 3d :)
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“3dmakerkid, post:16, topic:146668”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=200720.msg1783545#msg1783545 date=1190878504]
OK OK, so you’re saying, we take the already 3-D characters, and place them in an even more 3-d map. So you want to make a new source and client? Sounds like a huge waste of time for a bunch of people who won’t appreciate the work put into anything. They’d complain about how one thing pokes into another, or why they can’t use Thief Masks and Berets at the same time (Which you can do I’m sure, but you can’t hold a weapon I think).

It’s pointless, they’re already content with what they have, why try and make things more complicated. Besides, I doubt you have the know-how to make an entire new source when you just thought about this stuff when playing on a friends server. Even if you had a better plan of action, no one here would want to bother with it. And if I’m wrong, someone can say so.
[/quote] i know wut ur sayin but friend gona make the source and everything ima help but he told me 2 post this[/quote]

You don’t get 3d worlds from just “Source”, you need models, animators, time, incentive, and ‘leet’ skills to make a 3d game in Java.

And,

ThAt0n36Uy:

Why would any of us listen to some 7th grade backwater kid, that can even use correct grammar. Why would we even want to help when we get nothing out of it. Even if you’re saying your friend is going to do all the work, and you don’t need our help, why tell us? Why do we need to know about it? This isn’t a forum for MoparScape, which goes right back to the first issue. This topic is on the wrong forum.

He’s right you know.

Read full topic

This isn’t a forum for MoparScape, which goes right back to the first issue. This topic is on the wrong forum.

item.title: 3d :)
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

OK OK, so you’re saying, we take the already 3-D characters, and place them in an even more 3-d map. So you want to make a new source and client? Sounds like a huge waste of time for a bunch of people who won’t appreciate the work put into anything. They’d complain about how one thing pokes into another, or why they can’t use Thief Masks and Berets at the same time (Which you can do I’m sure, but you can’t hold a weapon I think).

It’s pointless, they’re already content with what they have, why try and make things more complicated. Besides, I doubt you have the know-how to make an entire new source when you just thought about this stuff when playing on a friends server. Even if you had a better plan of action, no one here would want to bother with it. And if I’m wrong, someone can say so.
